"Poppoâ™ª It's Popona!
The time has finally come to finish spreading my message about Idola and the Aries White Knights!"
"Back in my world, we have these huge monsters..."
"But there's enemies in this one that are just as big!"
"This is a perfect chance for us to put our best foot forward and show off what we can do!"
"Bam! Pow! Let's show everyone on the ARKS ship what the Aries White Knights are made of!"
